entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
